channel.title: Game Keeps Crashing
channel.description: I'm towards the end of we've got hostiles after the part where you first get to the surface and then go back under ground where the marines rappel down in after you and then you call through a vent well every time I get to the end of the vent my game crashes. Does anyone else have this problem??? Suggestions on a fix????

item.title: Game Keeps Crashing
item.dc:creator: doomztag
item.description:
OneDeagz:

I’m towards the end of we’ve got hostiles after the part where you first get to the surface and then go back under ground where the marines rappel down in after you and then you call through a vent well every time I get to the end of the vent my game crashes. Does anyone else have this problem??? Suggestions on a fix???

See if there are any graphics drivers out-of-date. I updated to the latest Nvidia and haven’t had a problem, yet. Worth a shot.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Keeps Crashing
item.dc:creator: doomztag
item.description:
OneDeagz:

I’m towards the end of we’ve got hostiles after the part where you first get to the surface and then go back under ground where the marines rappel down in after you and then you call through a vent well every time I get to the end of the vent my game crashes. Does anyone else have this problem??? Suggestions on a fix???

Yeah, I’m having my game crash at one spot, every time too. I’m on Surface Tension and there are Marines coming in on helicopters, right after finding the weapon cache and going through the collapsed building on fire. Any ideas?

Read full topic
